rules.natural: If the oak tree is endangered, then the conservation goal is achieved.

Provided that there is funding from the government grant, then if it is not the case that either the volcano is active or (if the coral reef is threatened, then the lionfish is not invasive) implies the marine reserve is not monitored, then the seagrass beds are restored.
Either the government grant provides funding or the private donation provides funding.

Whenever there is funding from the private donation, then if it is not the case that either the volcano is active or (if the coral reef is threatened, then the lionfish is not invasive) implies the marine reserve is not monitored, then the seagrass beds are restored.
If the conservation program is successful, then biodiversity does not increase.
Either the conservation program is successful or, if the logging company causes deforestation, then the forest area is not protected.
If the habitat is degraded, then it is fragmented.
If enforcement is weak, then enforcement is strict.
Whenever an eradication program controls invasives, then the lionfish is not invasive.

Under the condition that a scientific study conducts research, then if it is not the case that if the blue whale is migratory, then the forest area is not protected, then an eradication program controls invasives.
Research happens either through a scientific study or through a community survey.
Analysis occurs either via data collection or via field observation.

If field observation performs analysis, then whenever a community survey conducts research, then if it is not the case that if the blue whale is migratory, then the forest area is not protected, an eradication program controls invasives.

Provided that a research paper is published, then if data collection performs analysis, then under the condition that a community survey conducts research, then if it is not the case that if the blue whale is migratory, then the forest area is not protected, an eradication program controls invasives.
Publication happens either as a research paper or as a conference presentation.

Either the regulatory agency gives approval, or if a conference presentation is published, then under the condition that data collection performs analysis, then if a community survey conducts research, then provided that it is not the case that if the blue whale is migratory, then the forest area is not protected, an eradication program controls invasives.
Either the desert rose is blooming, or if the coral reef is threatened, then the lionfish is not invasive.
Whenever it is not the case that if the conservation program is successful, then biodiversity increases, then the habitat is degraded.
If it is not the case that if there is a fishing ban regulation, then if the blue whale is migratory, the forest area is not protected, then enforcement is weak.
Whenever it is not the case that if the blue whale is migratory, then the forest area is not protected, then the lionfish is invasive.
If it is not the case that if the blue whale is migratory, then the forest area is not protected, then the coral reef is threatened.
Under the condition that it is not the case that either the volcano is active or (if the coral reef is threatened, then the lionfish is not invasive), then the marine reserve is monitored.
Provided that the oak tree is not endangered, then the forest area is protected.
